DOC.detailed_description: Short-term active feeding study : The investigator provide various chickpea product participant 14 day chickpea enhance diet . Subjects receive specific meal plan instruction consumption 5 servings/week chickpea . Chickpea product source commercial provider . While participant tell substitute chickpea product diet ingredient , subject free choose substitute accord preference . Subjects keep daily food record tell chickpea consumption monitor fecal sample ( qPCR ) . Fecal sample collect start ( Day 1 ) , ( Day 7-9 ) end ( Day 14 ) intervention use stool collection kit ( Sigma ) . Participants complete GI health questionnaire weekly basis determine tolerance increase chickpea intake . An open end questionnaire administered participant complete short-term study protocol ass issue compliance chickpea intake . All individual increase chickpea intake usual diet least 3 servings/week include analysis .
DOC.criteria: Good Health No systemic antibiotic precede two month No medication suppress immune function Willingness provide basic demographic well medical history data Gastric Ulcers Inflammatory Bowel Disease ( IBD ) Irritable Bowel Syndrome ( IBS ) Chronic constipation/diarrhea Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 30 Dietary restriction prevent legume intake Currently medication affect GI transit time Consumption > 3 servings/week chickpea > 6 servings/week legume BEFORE study begin
